event.title: was founded by the Niassa Company in 1904

data.event: The town was founded by the Niassa Company in 1904 as Porto Am√©lia, after the Queen of Portugal, at the peninsula's south western tip and has grown around a port.

event.title: was renamed Pemba at the end of Portuguese rule, in 1975

data.event: It was renamed Pemba at the end of Portuguese rule, in 1975.
